p:
Reducing the impact of both crises will require unprecedented efforts from medical professionals as well as changes at all levels of government to ensure that the necessary tools are available to effectively combat these dual epidemics. Vaccine and pharmaceutical trials are under way, but we do not yet have proven treatments for the novel coronavirus. There are, however, effective medications to treat opioid use disorder (OUD) and reverse acute opioid overdose, as well as proven interventions to reduce harms associated with opioid injection.
